title: Tribute Trail
description: This is a fantasy novel that focuses on two men and their journeys on the Tribute Trail. One man is a Goddess-Chosen Prince; the other is a scout in a horse warrior tribe. The God and Goddess have chosen a path for them that one man resists while the other accepts. But whether they accept it or not, both men have a destiny to fulfill on the Tribute Trail.
author: Terri Beckett
